text: Jusuf ʙa sui dar firor kard va hamsari aziz az pusti u david, to uro ʙargardonad va zan comai uro az aqiʙ ʙidarond. Va savhari on zanro tasodufan nazdiki dar joftand. Zan guft: «Cazoi kase, ki ʙo zani tu qasdi ʙade dosta ʙosad, cist va tarsid, ki Jusufro nakusad va guft: cuz in ki ʙa zindon aftad jo ʙa azoʙe dardovar giriftor ojad?»
